extensionDescription.message: Un semplice client per Nextcloud Passwords

browserActionTitle.description: Title of the button in the browser bar

contextMenuTitle.description: Title of the context menu item

NoRelatedMatches.description: Shown when the related page did not find any results

NoSearchMatches.description: Shown when the search did not find any results

NoSearchQuery.description: Shown when the search query is empty

PasswordRequestFailedTitle.description: Notification title when the password request fails

PasswordRequestFailedText.message: Non è stato possibile recuperare l' elenco password. Errore: $ERROR$
PasswordRequestFailedText.description: Notification text when the password request fails

NewLoginDetectedTitle.description: Notification title when a new login is detected

NewLoginDetectedText.message: Clicca qui per salvare la password per "$USER$"
NewLoginDetectedText.description: Notification text when a new login is detected

PasswordCreatedTitle.description: Notification title when a password was saved

PasswordCreatedText.message: La password è stata memorizzata con successo
PasswordCreatedText.description: Notification text when a password was saved

CreatePasswordFailedTitle.description: Notification title when saving a password failed

CreatePasswordFailedText.message: Non è stato possibile salvare la password
CreatePasswordFailedText.description: Notification text when saving a password failed

UpdatedLoginDetectedTitle.description: Notification title when an updated login is detected

UpdatedLoginDetectedText.message: Clicca qui per aggiornare la password per "$USER$"
UpdatedLoginDetectedText.description: Notification text when an updated login is detected

PasswordUpdatedTitle.description: Notification title when a password was updated

PasswordUpdatedText.message: La password è stata aggiornata con successo
PasswordUpdatedText.description: Notification text when a password was updated

UpdatePasswordFailedTitle.description: Notification title when updating a password failed

UpdatePasswordFailedText.message: La password non può essere aggiornata
UpdatePasswordFailedText.description: Notification text when updating a password failed
